attributes.action: distribute one copy of the book "Nineteen Eighty-Four" by George Orwell to every British Citizen.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All citizens of Britain need a copy of this book so that they can read it in order to protect themselves against dishonest and oppressive tactics used by any government to gain effective dictatorial control over it's peoples whilst at the same time pretending to give it's peoples a democratic choice.
